pyref.dev

A fast, convenient way to access Python reference docs.

Quickly jump to the official documentation for Python standard library modules and popular packages by using a simple URL pattern:

https://pyref.dev/<fully.qualified.symbol.name>

Examples

  • https://pyref.dev/json
  • https://pyref.dev/pathlib.Path
  • https://pyref.dev/datetime.datetime.strftime
  • https://pyref.dev/numpy.array

Supported Packages

  • Python Standard Library
  • numpy
  • pandas
  • urllib3
  • requests
  • python-dateutil
